info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 6:51PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Avery County through 715 PM EDT... At 651 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Beech Mountain, or near Elk Park, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newland, Banner Elk, Elk Park, Beech Mountain In Avery County, Sugar Mountain, Seven Devils, Grandfather Mountain State Park and Minneapolis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
